headline: Is Palantir Technologies (PLTR) Pricing In Too Much Optimism After Its Recent Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Palantir Technologies at around US$174 per share still makes sense for your portfolio, the starting point is understanding what that price might be implying about the business. The stock has had a mixed run recently, with a 3.8% decline over the last week and a 4.2% decline over the last month, while still showing a 3.7% gain year to date and a very large return over the past 3 years and past 5 years, including 148.7% over the last year. Recent headlines have...

headline: A Look At Palantir Technologies (PLTR) Valuation After Renewed National Security Headlines And Earnings Anticipation
summary: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) is back in focus after headlines linked its AI platforms to the U.S. operation that captured Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro, an unconfirmed connection that still lifted sentiment around its national security footprint. See our latest analysis for Palantir Technologies. The Maduro headlines arrive after a choppy spell, with a 7 day share price return of 3.76% decline, a 30 day share price return of 4.25% decline and a 90 day share price return of 5.19%...
